```{r , echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Libraries
set.seed(96024)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
library(bookdown)
data = read.csv("data/worldwidecases.csv")
sample(unique(data$countriesAndTerritories),2)

data = data %>%
  filter(countriesAndTerritories %in% c("Myanmar","Guernsey"))

data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=dateRep,y=cases))+geom_line()+facet_wrap(~countriesAndTerritories)

data %>%
  group_by(countriesAndTerritories,month) %>%
  summarise(n=sum(cases)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=month,y=n,col=countriesAndTerritories))+geom_line()
```
